hyper.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: extremely excited or nervous about something
hyper.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: No, don’t give Luke any candy – it’ll make him hyper.
hyper.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: more than usual, especially too much
hyper.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: beyond the usual size or limits
hyper.translation[1].definitions[1].exam: a hyperlink  (=from one website to another)
